amendment.description: Amendment ensures that students enrolled in two-year, certificate, associate, or baccalaureate programs are eligible for STEM programs. The amendment calls for a report of agency approaches to increase minority participation in STEM careers.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 8 printed in Part B of House Report 111-479 to ensure that students enrolled in two-year, certificate, associate, or baccalaureate programs are eligible for STEM programs. It also would call for a report of agency approaches to increase minority participation in STEM careers.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Gordon (TN) amendment (A005) Agreed to by voice vote.
